title: Pixel 1 won't go past Google logo on boot
content:
I was given this lovely phone in this state (doesn't boot up) and I'd love to get it working. I can do the power / volume down at least and I get this below. I am pretty tech savvy (windows!) but not so much android, but happy to follow clear instructions. Thanks!

bl: 8996-012001-1908071822
baseband: 8996-130361-1905270421
product: sailfish-row-pvt
serial: FA6A60305576
CPU:     M S M8996SG-A B 0X10001
UFS 32GB SAMSUNG
DRAM 4096MB HYNIX LPDDR4
BOOT SLOT A
CONSOLE DISABLED
SECURE BOOT PRODUCTION
DEVICE IS LOCKED
